entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
